comments.content: Your sample is too small to be sure, but it looks like **[Gotham (Medium)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317112432/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Hoefler%2BFrere-Jones%20%2F%20%28Commercial%29&ffam=Gotham%20-%20Medium&fid=c9f7f5fbf27d0712643cf5d0738ae903&fsize=60&text=MY%20TOTO%20TUTORIAL&fit=1)** by Hoefler&Co.
